www.BTMON.com Subtle Colors & Dark Elegant Texture

   please use with Gabriel Sharp's Global Inline Frame, Table and Ad Remover Style:

info.additionalInfo:
There are no ads if you use AD-Block+, which most do. I didn't 'ad' any of my own blockers to the style. (no pun unintended).

Update: March 8, 2014 - code rewritten, added a background and some custom styling


SPECIAL NOTE: I'm deleting the sister style, the inline ad removal for torrentz/btmon, that blocks ads because it's not needed, use adblock+ instead if not already doing so!
